meanings.definition: The foundation or base upon which railroad tracks are laid.
meanings.sent1: The railbed was made of sturdy materials to support the train tracks.
meanings.sent2: The workers inspected the railbed to ensure it was strong and stable.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel thought the railbed was a perfect place to hide its acorns.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was the railbed on which her success train ran smoothly.
meanings.sent5: The sunlit railbed stretched out like a welcoming path for the train.

meanings.definition: The surface or structure supporting a railway track.
meanings.sent1: The train glided smoothly along the railbed, carrying passengers to their destination.
meanings.sent2: The maintenance crew worked tirelessly to repair the damaged railbed after the storm.
meanings.sent3: The children imagined the railbed was a giant snake slithering through the forest.
meanings.sent4: His love for her was the sturdy railbed on which their relationship was built.
meanings.sent5: The railbed hummed with the rhythm of the passing train, echoing through the valley.
